result.eng: You will be the most beautiful girl in the world.
result.ga: beidh tú ar an chailín is áille ar domhan
result.orig: Beidh tú ar an chailín is áille ar domhan
result.html: beidh tú ar an chailín is áille ar domhanYou will be the most beautiful girl in the world.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ tú ar an ċailín is áille ar doṁanYou will be the most beautiful girl in the world.

result.html: cailín álainn tusaYou are a beautiful girl.
result.ponchtml: cailín álainn tusaYou are a beautiful girl.

result.eng: You are not as pretty as me.
result.html: níl tú chomh hálainn liomsaYou are not as pretty as me.
result.ponchtml: níl tú ċoṁ hálainn liomsaYou are not as pretty as me.

result.ga: tá a cuid gruaige go hálainn
result.orig: Tá a cuid gruaige go hálainn
result.html: tá a cuid gruaige go hálainnHer hair is beautiful.
result.ponchtml: tá a cuid gruaige go hálainnHer hair is beautiful.

result.eng: This single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.

result.html: tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadhThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ponchtml: tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósaḋThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.

result.ga: tá an teach seo go hálainn
result.orig: Tá an teach seo go hálainn
result.html: tá an teach seo go hálainnThis house is beautiful.
result.ponchtml: tá an teaċ seo go hálainnThis house is beautiful.

result.eng: Carna [a place in County Galway] is nice.
result.ga: tá carna go hálainn
result.html: tá carna go hálainnCarna [a place in County Galway] is nice.
result.ponchtml: tá carna go hálainnCarna [a place in County Galway] is nice.

result.eng: Rome is lovely. I was there last year.
result.ga: tá an róimh go hálainn bhí mé ansin anuraidh
result.orig: Tá an Róimh go hálainn Bhí mé ansin anuraidh
result.html: tá an róimh go hálainn bhí mé ansin anuraidhRome is lovely. I was there last year.
result.ponchtml: tá an róiṁ go hálainn ḃí mé ansin anuraiḋRome is lovely. I was there last year.

result.eng: There are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.
result.ga: tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámha
result.orig: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámha
result.html: tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámhaThere are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.
result.ponchtml: tá áiseanna maiṫe ann ionad siopadóireaċta cúpla teaċ táḃairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snáṁaThere are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.

result.eng: I don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ga: ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.orig: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.html: ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ponchtml: ní cuiṁin liom gaċ pioc den scéal aċ is cuiṁin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
